com.skobbler.ngx.positioner

Class SKCurrentPositionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.positioner.SKCurrentPositionProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.location.LocationListener

    public class SKCurrentPositionProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.location.LocationListener
    Class that provides current position updates using Android location services
    Version:
    3.0.2

      • requestLocationUpdates

        public void requestLocationUpdates(boolean useGpsProvider,
                          boolean useNetworkProvider,
                          boolean usePassiveProvider)
        Initiates current position requests from the specified provider
        Parameters:
        useGpsProvider - - true if the GPS provider should be used
        useNetworkProvider - - true if the network provider should be used
        usePassiveProvider - - true if the passive provider should be used

      • stopLocationUpdates

        Stops position requests
